page.title: Stocks Sink on Oil Prices, Morgan Stanley
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Stocks fell sharply on Wednesday after oil prices jumped more than a dollar to over \$48 a barrel and investment bank Morgan Stanley <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=MWD.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">MWD.N</A> reported a drop in its quarterly profit.
